name: "Love Is..." bracelet
description:
Love is patient and kind; love does not envy or boast; it is not arrogant or rude. It does not insist on its own way; it is not irritable or resentful; it does not rejoice at wrongdoing, but rejoices with the truth. Love bears all things, believes all things, hopes all things, endures all things. Love never ends. As for prophecies, they will pass away; as for tongues, they will cease; as for knowledge, it will pass away. -1 Corinthians 13:4-8 


♥ 18Kt Gold Plated 
♥ 18Kt White Gold Plated
♥ Adjustable

name: "Strong Ties" Bracelet
description:
"I want them to be encouraged and knit together by strong ties of love. I want them to have complete confidence that they understand God's mysterious plan, which is Christ himself." -Colossians 2:2  (NLT)

♥ 18Kt Gold Plated 
♥ 18Kt White Gold Plated
♥ Austrian Crystal 
♥ Adjustable

name: "Perfect Peace" Bracelet
description:
*********NEW!!!!!!!********

John 16:33
"I have told you these things, so that in me you may have peace. In this world you will have trouble. But take heart! I have overcome the world."


♥ 18Kt Gold Plated 
♥ 18Kt White Gold Plated 
♥ Austrian Crystal 
♥ Adjustable

name: "Renewed Strength" Bracelet
description:
♥ ♥ ♥ LIMITED AVAILABILITY ♥ ♥ ♥

Isaiah 40:31 (NIT) - But those who hope in the Lord will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles, they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint. 

♥ 18Kt Gold Plated 
♥ Adjustable 

*silver NOW AVAILABLE!!!*

name: NEVER BROKEN "Classic" Skully
description:
Time to rock NEVER BROKEN out loud! Here's the 1st of the brand's expansion into Apparel, the "Classic" skully hat. Features the words "NEVER BROKEN" across the front in candy pink on a soft charcoal grey material with cuff. 

100% Acrylic

All apparel will be shipped USPS Priority (2-3 days) within the US

name: "Pure Heart" Bangle
description: Proverbs 17:3 (NLT) - Fire tests the purity of silver and gold, but the LORD tests the heart.

name: Antiqued Side Cross Bracelet
description:
Please be aware the chain for the bracelet currently in stock is meant for larger wrists.

Adjustable bracelet coming soon....

name: Antiqued Side Cross Necklace
description:

Colors: Silver
            Gold

name: "Heaven's Heart" Necklace
description: "When love is lost, do not bow your head in sadness; instead keep your head up high and gaze into heaven for that is where your broken heart has been sent to heal."

name: "Touch & Agree" Bracelet
description:
♥ ♥ ♥ LIMITED EDITION ♥ ♥ ♥

Matthew 18:19 (NLT) - "I also tell you this: If two of you agree here on earth concerning anything you ask, my Father in heaven will do it for you."

name: Special Event Orders
description:
Never Broken will now be providing party favors for special events. This list includes but is not limited to,

*Bridal Showers
*Religious Events
*College Campus Events
*Baby Showers
*Bachelorette Parties
*Birthday Parties
*Etc....

With our special event orders, you will be able to provide your favorite items to your participants at a fraction of the cost. Each favor will comes with your choice in colors for each individual bag, a special message or scripture on the back of each gift tag and any other special request that we may accommodate. The possibilities with this kind of order are endless. 

To order, a deposit of $50 will be required to prepare your customizations. In the special instructions box provided during checkout, please list any information that will be helpful to the start of your order such as colors, your special message, and your selected items. After your deposit has been placed, a price quote will be sent directly to you within 3-4 days. Please prepare ahead of time for your event by at least 2-3 weeks.
